description: Associates a service with a service network.

DomainName.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

HostedZoneId.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

DnsEntry.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

Key.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 128  
Update requires: No interruption

Value.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 256  
Update requires: No interruption

Tag.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

ServiceNetworkIdentifier.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 20  
Maximum Length: 2048  
Pattern: ^((sn-[0-9a-z]{17})|(arn:[a-z0-9\-]+:vpc-lattice:[a-zA-Z0-9\-]+:\d{12}:servicenetwork/sn-[0-9a-z]{17}))$  
Update requires: Replacement

ServiceIdentifier.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 20  
Maximum Length: 2048  
Pattern: ^((svc-[0-9a-z]{17})|(arn:[a-z0-9\-]+:vpc-lattice:[a-zA-Z0-9\-]+:\d{12}:service/svc-[0-9a-z]{17}))$  
Update requires: Replacement

Tags.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

ServiceNetworkIdentifier.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 20  
Maximum Length: 2048  
Pattern: ^((sn-[0-9a-z]{17})|(arn:[a-z0-9\-]+:vpc-lattice:[a-zA-Z0-9\-]+:\d{12}:servicenetwork/sn-[0-9a-z]{17}))$  
Update requires: No interruption

ServiceIdentifier.markdownDescription:
---

Update requires: No interruption

Arn.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 20  
Maximum Length: 2048  
Pattern: ^arn:[a-z0-9\-]+:vpc-lattice:[a-zA-Z0-9\-]+:\d{12}:servicenetworkserviceassociation/snsa-[0-9a-z]{17}$  
Update requires: No interruption

CreatedAt.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

Id.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 17  
Maximum Length: 2048  
Pattern: ^snsa-[0-9a-z]{17}$  
Update requires: No interruption

ServiceNetworkArn.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 20  
Maximum Length: 2048  
Pattern: ^arn:[a-z0-9\-]+:vpc-lattice:[a-zA-Z0-9\-]+:\d{12}:servicenetwork/sn-[0-9a-z]{17}$  
Update requires: No interruption

ServiceNetworkId.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 20  
Maximum Length: 20  
Pattern: ^sn-[0-9a-z]{17}$  
Update requires: No interruption

ServiceNetworkName.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 3  
Maximum Length: 63  
Pattern: ^(?!servicenetwork-)(?![-])(?!.*[-]$)(?!.*[-]{2})[a-z0-9-]+$  
Update requires: No interruption

ServiceArn.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 20  
Maximum Length: 2048  
Pattern: ^arn:[a-z0-9\-]+:vpc-lattice:[a-zA-Z0-9\-]+:\d{12}:service/svc-[0-9a-z]{17}$  
Update requires: No interruption

ServiceId.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 21  
Maximum Length: 21  
Pattern: ^svc-[0-9a-z]{17}$  
Update requires: No interruption

ServiceName.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 3  
Maximum Length: 40  
Pattern: ^(?!svc-)(?![-])(?!.*[-]$)(?!.*[-]{2})[a-z0-9-]+$  
Update requires: No interruption

Status.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: CREATE_IN_PROGRESS | ACTIVE | DELETE_IN_PROGRESS | CREATE_FAILED | DELETE_FAILED  
Update requires: No interruption
